task.title: Integrating the Plugin with the DocBook XSL Distribution

prereq.p:
The WebHelp plugin transformations run as an Ant build script. The requirements are:
Ant 1.8 or later
Java Virtual Machine 1.6 or later
DocBook XSL 1.78.1 or later
Saxon 6.5.5
Saxon 9.1.0.8

context.p: To integrate the plugin with the DocBook XSL distribution, follow these steps:

step.cmd: Download and install a Java Virtual Machine 1.6 or later.
Download and install Ant 1.8. or later.
Download the DocBook XSL 1.78.1 stylesheets and unzip them in a separate directory.
Go to the website, download the WebHelp for DocBook distribution, and unzip it in the DocBook XSL directory that was created in step 3.
step.stepresult: The DocBook XSL directory should now contain a new subdirectory named com.oxygenxml.webhelp.classic and two new files, oxygen_custom.xsl and oxygen_custom_html.xsl.

step.cmd: If you have not already done so, copy your license key into a licensekey.txt file and place it in the com.oxygenxml.webhelp.classic directory.
Download and unzip saxon6-5-5.zip on your computer.
Download and unzip saxonb9-1-0-8j.zip on your computer.
